page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: Wath has several junior{schools}a large comprehensive, a catholic comprehensive and Brampton Ellis Comp which is to close in 1985.The oldest Wath school is the{Church school}or National which dates back before 1850.The Brampton school for poor children was founded though in 1680 by George Ellis.It started with 20 children and in the 1890's had over 400 pupils.An Ellis Infant school was opened in 1866,The secondary school was opened in 1930.The newest school in the area is Stokewell Rd opened in 1973.There is also a college of {further}education,Rockingham.Storm House school for autistic children and the Oaks special school.
